item.title: Former NCAA woman of year among 6 dead in family plane crash in NY
item.description: Karenna Groff, a former MIT soccer player once named the NCAA woman of the year, was one of six people killed in a plane crash.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to host Salvadoran president at White House
item.description: Presidents Donald Trump and Nayib Bukele are scheduled to meet Monday at the White House.

item.title: Possible motives surface after fire at Pennsylvania governor's residence: Sources
item.description: An overnight fire at the governor's residence in Pennsylvania is being investigated as arson, the Pennsylvania State Police said Sunday.

item.title: Ban on music glorifying cartels sparks violence, chaos at concert
item.description: Luis R. Conriquez and his band were forced to flee the stage after saying he had been banned by the government from singing "narcocorridos" music.

item.title: Retrial opens for Sarah Palin's libel suit against The New York Times
item.description: A retrial is set to begin for Sarah Palin's lawsuit accusing The New York Times of libeling her in an editorial eight years ago
